title: pin unlock not working looping ,performed factory reset .........
content:
Pin unlock started looping and would not unlock the phone even though the pin was correct .......

i factory reset as per procedure holding power key and volume key 

the phone goes through the procedure then asks to load data from an old phone or iphone i obviously dont  i follow onscreen instructions and the phone asks to verify old pin i put in the correct pin and it continues to loop and will not proceed to the next action

There is an option under the pin verification that say "use my google account instead" this function does not open 

i have the correct pin i have factory reset ..........please help it is very frustrating
